course_recommendation.recommendation_reasoning: The website is for an 'Institute of Engineering and Technology' offering a vast array of B.Tech, M.Tech, BCA, MCA programs with numerous specializations in Computer Science, IT, AI, ML, Data Science, Cyber-Security, IoT, and Electronics Engineering, supported by extensive technical innovation labs like AWS, Salesforce, Robotics, and IoT labs.

metadata.institution_name: Noida Institute of Engineering and Technology (NIET, Greater Noida)
